mapper.sql: a.id AS "id",a.luc_check_id AS "lucCheckId",a.chufangyouyan AS "chufangyouyan",a.youyanjiechupinlv AS "youyanjiechupinlv",a.youyanjiechunianshu AS "youyanjiechunianshu",a.chouyouyanji AS "chouyouyanji",a.chouyouyanjinianshu AS "chouyouyanjinianshu",a.xiyan AS "xiyan",a.zuihouyicxiyan AS "zuihouyicxiyan",a.kaishixiyannianling AS "kaishixiyannianling",a.meitianxiyanliang AS "meitianxiyanliang",a.beidongxiyan AS "beidongxiyan",a.beidongxiyanduixiang AS "beidongxiyanduixiang",a.beidongxiyannianshu AS "beidongxiyannianshu",a.zhiyezhiaiwuzhi AS "zhiqiguanyan",a.zhiqiguanyan_nianshu AS "zhiqiguanyanNianshu",a.feiqizhong AS "feiqizhong",a.feiqizhong_nianshu AS "feiqizhongNianshu",a.feijiehe AS "feijiehe",a.feijiehe_nianshu AS "feijieheNianshu",a.guichenzhuo AS "guichenzhuo",a.guichenzhuo_nianshu AS "guichenzhuoNianshu",a.xianweihua AS "xianweihua",a.xianweihua_nianshu AS "xianweihuaNianshu",a.manzufei AS "manzufei",a.manzufei_nianshu AS "manzufeiNianshu",a.qitafeibing AS "qitafeibing",a.qitafeibing_nianshu AS "qitafeibingNianshu",a.ganke AS "ganke",a.ganke_tianshu AS "gankeTianshu",a.tanzhongdaixue AS "tanzhongdaixue",a.tanzhongdaix_tianshu AS "tanzhongdaixTianshu",a.qiji AS "qiji",a.qiji_tianshu AS "qijiTianshu",a.xiongmen AS "xiongmen",a.xiongmen_tianshu AS "xiongmenTianshu",a.xiongtong AS "xiongtong",a.xiongtong_tianshu AS "xiongtongTianshu",a.shengyinsiya AS "shengyinsiya",a.tongbuweifeiyan AS "tongbuweifeiyan",a.feijiejie AS "feijiejie",a.jiejiedaxiao AS AS "assessmentResult",a.assessment_doc AS "assessmentDoc",a.assessment_doc_name AS "assessmentDocName",a.assessment_date AS "assessmentDate",a.risk_quality_flag AS "riskQualityFlag",a.upload_time AS "uploadTime",a.del_flag AS "delFlag",a.create_by AS "createBy",a.create_date AS "createDate"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM luc_risk_assessment a WHERE a.luc_check_id = #{checkid} and a.del_flag='0'
mapper.update: UPDATE luc_risk_assessment SET del_flag = '1' WHERE id = #{id}
